summary: Tunes down dogs barking by -8db. Makes barking bearable, without completely disabling it for the sake of immersion.
descriptionHtml:
We love out dog, but he can\'t shut up. So I took the original files and tuned them down by -8db.

Note this is only a temporary fix until the Mod tools are out, then we can tune down Vigilance barks without having to tune down all of them.

INSTALL:
Just copy the folder into your DATA folder.

UNINSTALL:
Delete the folder \"bark\" in:
\"sound/fx/npc/dog/\"
author: D0rkL0rd
